alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Jasper; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EFFINGHAM, CHATHAM, BEAUFORT AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 659 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Monteith, or near Savannah International Airport, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. At 656 PM, a wind gust to 51 mph was observed at the Savannah International Airport. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Hilton Head Island, Bluffton, Bellinger Hill Area, Savannah International Airport, Hutchinson Island, Downtown Savannah, Godley Station, and Jasper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
